channel.title: Type B Problems on Tristan Berchoux
channel.description: Recent content in Type B Problems on Tristan Berchoux

item.title: In data science - it's the problem, stupid!
item.description: I just saw this article talking about how in the biotech world, you can’t get caught chasing the latest technology. You have to start with a problem you are solving for people and then work your way back. This reminds me a lot of Type B problems in data science/statistics. We have a pile of data, so we don’t need to have a problem to solve, it will come to us later.
